object.content:
2013 Volkswagen Passat CC :
The most frugal edition of Volkswagen CC car might just take the name of “the sleek sedan with a couple-like body” from the Hyundai sonata with its inoffensive, slab-sided external which is undeniably elegant. Anyway apart from a fresh styling on the grille and further automatic whizz bangs, the 2013 Volkswagen CC vehicle might not be big various from its predecessors. The vehicle still holds it economical situation with even lower pricing for USA editions without compromising on soothe, reliability and the wish for adventure that increases in enthusiastic drivers sometimes.
Interior
If you have been in a Volkswagen group car before, then you know the quick inviting manner of the dashboard even before you begin the vehicle- the WW passat CC vehicle is no different from other cars.  The best leather seats are happy and seemingly luxurious, with amazing meetings here there for more “touchy” feel in its war against the highly priced CLS Mercedes. The plastic of this car soft to the touch, the typefaces very well admirably concise and full cabin easy but distinctly amazing to the easy but best man. Head-room might not competitor that of the CLS Mercedes but there is sufficient leg-room for a dwarf party. The legs of drivers are offset towards the hub and energy seats configure in twelve different dimensions, but the party does not close there.
Features
Fuel economy: 60 mpg
Price: $ 24300 to $30200
Drivetrain : Six-speed Manual, FWD
Power: 138 horsepower @1750 rpm
Engine: 2.0L turbo 4-cylinder diesel
Road Performance
The car engine with 130 horsepower and gather economy of 59mg will leave you almost complexly relax if you are not going for a road race. The amazing mileage is a feedback of VWs BlueMotion energy saving advancement using a best alternator that creates Prius ETCS-i. The modern gearbox is a six-speed handy that transmit with perfect spaced ratio for driving
